content.question: Let g be a twice-differentiable, increasing function of t. If <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>20</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbWdamaabmaabaWdbiaaicdaa8aacaGLOaGaayzkaaWdbiaa bccacqGH9aqpcaqGGaGaaGOmaiaaicdaaaa@3D45@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mn>10</mn></mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>220</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbWdamaabmaabaWdbiaaigdacaaIWaaapaGaayjkaiaawMca a8qacaqGGaGaeyypa0JaaeiiaiaaikdacaaIYaGaaGimaaaa@3EBC@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> , which of the following must be true on the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mtext> </mtext><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>10</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIWaGaaeiiaiabgYda8iaadshacqGH8aapcaqGGaGaaGymaiaa icdaaaa@3C8C@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>?

choices.label: <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mo>'</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbGaai4ja8aadaqadaqaa8qacaWG0baapaGaayjkaiaawMca a8qacaqGGaGaeyypa0Jaaeiiaiaaicdaaaa@3D73@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for some t in the interval.

<math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mo>'</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>20</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbGaai4ja8aadaqadaqaa8qacaWG0baapaGaayjkaiaawMca a8qacaqGGaGaeyypa0JaaeiiaiaaikdacaaIWaaaaa@3E2F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for some t in the interval.

<math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mo>'</mo><mo>'</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbGaai4jaiaacEcapaWaaeWaaeaapeGaamiDaaWdaiaawIca caGLPaaapeGaaeiiaiabg2da9iaabccacaaIWaaaaa@3E1E@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for some t in the interval.

<math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mo>'</mo><mo>'</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mo>></mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbGaai4jaiaacEcapaWaaeWaaeaapeGaamiDaaWdaiaawIca caGLPaaapeGaaeiiaiabg6da+iaabccacaaIWaaaaa@3E20@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for all t in the interval.

content.answer: <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mo>'</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>20</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbGaai4ja8aadaqadaqaa8qacaWG0baapaGaayjkaiaawMca a8qacaqGGaGaeyypa0JaaeiiaiaaikdacaaIWaaaaa@3E2F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for some t in the interval.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
